```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(Hmisc)
library(rqPen)
library(vctrs)
library(foreign)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)

```


# Reading Data

```{r warning=FALSE}

naes08_phone <- read.spss("raw_data/naes/naes08-phone-nat-rcs-data-full.sav",
                  to.data.frame = TRUE, use.value.labels = FALSE)
naes08_phone[naes08_phone == 998] <- NA
naes08_phone[naes08_phone == 999] <- NA

```


## Cleaning Data

```{r}

df08phone <- naes08_phone %>%
  mutate(DATE_c = ymd(DATE_c)) %>%
  mutate(WEEK_c = cut.Date(DATE_c, breaks = "1 week", labels = FALSE))

```


```{r include=FALSE}

rm(list = ls())

```
